changeSet.author: dezlo
changeSet.sql: insert into challenge values (default, 3, 'first challenge', now(), now() + '+02:00', 'description for first challenge'), (default, 2, 'second challenge', now(), now() + '+02:00', 'description for second challenge'), (default, 1, 'third challenge', now(), now() + '+02:00', 'description for third challenge');
